howItWorks.title: With Mythoria, creating your own story is easy:

step1.title: Choose your character(s)
step1.description: Select your children, grandchildren, or any special young person in your life.

step2.title: Tell us about their passions and superpowers
step2.description: What makes them special? Highlight their unique talents or interests!

step3.title: Optional: Upload a photo
step3.description: Or simply describe the characters, and we'll handle the rest.

step4.title: Pick from over 20 fantastic story settings
step4.description: From enchanted castles to exciting space missions, we have adventures suited for every child's imagination.

step5.title: Fully customize with unique details!
step5.description: Write or simply speak about all the little details you'd like included. Even include specific products, services, or meaningful family traditions.

step6.title: Choose your gift format
step6.description: Receive your personalized story as a beautiful hardcover book, a digital ebook, or an engaging audiobook.

howItWorks.conclusion: We'll take care of everything else, powered by the magic of Artificial Intelligence!

AboutUs.title: Hello! My name is Rodrigo and I'm almost 18 years old.

paragraphs.p1: I grew up fascinated by the adventures my dad invented, stories that fueled my imagination and taught me that each of us can be the hero of incredible adventures.
paragraphs.p2: Today, I not only enjoy hearing stories, but I also love creating them. I'm passionate about Artificial Intelligence and discovered that AI could help build fantastic worlds and unforgettable characters. I particularly enjoy crafting stories to tell my younger brother, turning each narrative into a unique and personal experience.
paragraphs.p3: When I first used ChatGPT, I was amazed by the potential of this technology. Since then, I've been exploring the endless possibilities AI offers to personalize and enhance storytelling.
paragraphs.p4: Could a 17-year-old create an innovative company using only Artificial Intelligence? Driven by this ambition and curiosity, Mythoria was born‚Äîa project dedicated to crafting fully personalized books, where every child becomes the hero of their own adventure.
paragraphs.tagline: Mythoria is more than just a book: it's your very own story.
